items.translated_title: Treasury sanctions Russian zero-day broker accused of buying exploits stolen from U.S. defense contractor
items.content: The U.S. Treasury announced it was imposing sanctions against a Russian broker of zero-day exploits, its founder and two affiliates, citing a threat to U.S. national security. Another affiliated zero-day broker in the United Arab Emirates was also sanctioned.
